basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period September-October
basic.color: Leaf color green , fruit color brown

maintenance.soil: Fertile sandy loam or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade, good growth under sunlight
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead, rotten, diseased leaves and the parts that may affect the good appearance
